alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:47PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Prowers, Kiowa and northern Bent Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 647 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamar, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lamar, Las Animas, Holly, Eads, Granada, Wiley, Sheridan Lake, Hartman, Haswell, Neeoshe Reservoir, McClave, Chivington, Brandon, Blue Lake, Towner, Bristol, Sweetwater Reservoir, Hasty, Neegronda Reservoir and Queens Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
